The Bella Partia Restaurant
About Bella Partia
The Bella Partia restaurant is situated in Disneyland, Kurdistan and is the BEST italian restaurant worldwide! Aside from our traditional Italian dishes, we also have mouth-watering specialties from other cultures, especially Chinese, as well! Go take a look at our menu!
